headline: Assessing Corteva (CTVA) Valuation As Seed Spin Off And Telbek PRO Launch Reshape Growth Story
summary: Corteva (CTVA) is in focus after outlining plans to spin off its seeds business in 2026. The company is also launching its Telbek PRO fungicide, a product aimed at key wheat diseases in Canada. See our latest analysis for Corteva. The recent seeds spin off announcement and Telbek PRO launch come after a steady run in the shares, with a 30 day share price return of 6.49%, a 90 day share price return of 12.63%, and a 5 year total shareholder return of 90.11%. This points to momentum that has...
